title: NEIGRIHMS Recruitment 2017 – Dental Officer, DEO & Other Posts

organizations.name: north eastern indira gandhi regional institute of health and medical sciences
north eastern indira gandhi regional institute of health & medical sciences

text: Click here for Data Entry Operator Post Details NEIGRIHMS Recruitment 2017 – Dental Officer, JRF & Other Posts: North Eastern Indira Gandhi Regional Institute of Health & Medical Sciences (NEIGRIHMS), Shillong has published notification for the recruitment of Dental Officer, Statistical Officer, Medical Physicist & Junior Research Fellow (NET) vacancies for 02 various projects on temporary & direct recruitment basis. Eligible candidates may apply in prescribed application format on or before 04-04-2017 for Post No. 01 to 03 & 10-03-2017 by 02:00 P.M. for Post No. 04. Other details like age limit, educational qualification, selection process & how to apply are given below…. NEIGRIHMS Vacancy Details: Total No. of Posts: 04 Name of the Post: 1. Dental Officer: 01 Post (PWD Candidates) 2. Statistical Officer: 01 Post (PWD Candidates) 3. Medical Physicist: 01 Post (PWD Candidates) 4. Junior Research Fellow (NET): 01 Post Age Limit: Candidates age limit should be not exceeding 45 years for Post No. 01, 35 years for Post No. 02 & 03 as on closing date of application. Age relaxation is applicable to 05 years for Govt. servants in accordance with the instructions or orders issued by the Govt. of India. Educational Qualification : Candidates should possess Post Graduation Viz. MDS in the speciality concerned or A recognized Dental Qualification included in the part-I or part-II of the Schedule to the Dentistry Act 1948 (Person possessing qualifications included in part-I or specified in the sub-section (1) or (2) or (4) of Section 10 of the Dentist Act, 1948) and registered with Dental Council of India for Post No. 01, Post Graduation Degree in Statistics and Post Graduation Diploma in Computer Application (PGDCA) for Post No. 02, M.Sc in Medical Physics or equivalent, M.Sc in Physics and Post Graduation Diploma/ Degree in Radiological/ Medical Physics for Post No. 03 M.Sc in Zoology with NET qualification, B.VSc/ M.VSc in any discipline and MBBS/ Post Graduation Degree in ENT for Post No. 04 from a recognised University/ Institute. Selection Process : Candidates will be selected based on test/ interview for Post No. 01 to 03 & written test for Post No. 04. How to Apply : Eligible candidates may send their application in prescribed format with attested copies of certificates & testimonials, two copies of recent passport size photographs in an envelope should be super scribed with “Application for the Post of ————–” to the Recruitment Cell, Establishment Section – II, North Eastern Indira Gandhi Regional Institute of Health and Medical Sciences, Mawdiangdiang, Shillong-793 018 on or before 04-04-2017 for Post No. 01 to 03 & send their application and CV on plain paper giving details of all educational qualifications, experience, contact address, phone no., email etc and photocopies of relevant documents to the Principal Investigator by e mail abhijeet.bhatia@gov.in on or before 10-03-2017 for Post No. 04. Important Dates: Last Date for Receipt of Application for Post No. 01 to 03 04-04-2017 Last Date for Receipt of Application for Post No. 04 10-03-2017 by 02:00 P.M. Date for Written Test for Post No. 04 11-03-2017 at 11:00 A.M. to 12:00 Noon Reporting Time for Post No. 04 09:00 A.M. Venue for Post No. 04 Examination Hall, Administrative Block, NEIGRIHMS, Shillong- 793018 For more details like pay scale, experience, reservation, duration & other information click on the link given below….
